---
title: "Anaconda and Spyder Installation Guide for macOS"
---

## Introduction

This guide will lead you through the process of installing Anaconda, a popular Python distribution, on your macOS computer. Anaconda provides a convenient way to manage Python packages and environments, and it includes Spyder, a powerful IDE for scientific computing.

## Prerequisites

Before you begin, make sure you have the following:

1. A macOS computer.
2. An internet connection.
3. Adequate disk space for the installation.

## Installation Steps

### 1. Download Anaconda
Visit the Anaconda download page at [https://www.anaconda.com/download](https://www.anaconda.com/download).

### 2. Choose the macOS Installer
Click on the "**Download**" button under the macOS section depending on your System-on-chip (**Intel/M1/M2**) to download the Anaconda installer for macOS.

![Download Anaconda](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-1.png)

### 3. Run the Installer

- Locate the downloaded file, usually in your "_Downloads_" folder.
- Double-click the Anaconda disk image (`.dmg`) file to open it and click "**Allow**" when prompted.

![Run Installer](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-2.png)

![Allow Installation](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-3.png)

### 4. Follow the Installer Wizard

- Follow on-screen instructions to begin the installation.
- Read and accept the license agreement when prompted.

![Read Me](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-4.png)

![License Agreement](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-5.png)

### 5. Install Anaconda
Click the "**Install**" button to start the installation process. This may take a few minutes.

![Install](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-6.png)

### 6. Complete the Installation
Once installation is complete, you'll see a confirmation message. Click "**Continue**" and close the installation wizard by clicking "**Close**".

![Installation Complete](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-7.png)

![Close Installation Wizard](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-8.png)

### 7. Move the Installer File to Trash **(Optional)**

![Move the Installer to Trash](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-9.png)

### 8. If prompted to update the navigator, select "No, don't show again"

![Don't Update](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-10.png)

### 9. You're <u>NOT REQUIRED</u> to Log in/Sign up for Anaconda Cloud; close the prompt by clicking the "x" button

![Don't Log in/Sign up](../../../media/anaconda-mac/screenshot-13.png)

### 10. Access Spyder through Anaconda Navigator

- Open _Anaconda Navigator_, which is now installed on your system.

![Launch Anaconda Navigator](../../../media/anaconda-mac/Step_12.png)

- Locate Spyder and click "**Launch**" to open the _Spyder IDE_.

![Launch Spyder](../../../media/anaconda-mac/Step_13.png)

![Spyder](../../../media/anaconda-mac/Step_14.png)

## Conclusion

Congratulations! You've successfully installed Anaconda and Spyder on your macOS computer. Utilize Spyder for scientific computing and Python development. 

For further guidance on using Anaconda, refer to the official documentation at [https://docs.anaconda.com/](https://docs.anaconda.com/). 

If you encounter any issues or have questions, seek assistance from the Anaconda community or consult the documentation for troubleshooting tips.
